Package net.minecraft

Enum Class ChatFormatting

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<net.minecraft.ChatFormatting>
net.minecraft.ChatFormatting
All Implemented Interfaces:
net.minecraft.util.StringRepresentable
public enum ChatFormatting extends Enum<ChatFormatting> implements net.minecraft.util.StringRepresentable
Represents a ChatColor.
